document_data.name: Hothal
document_data.Description: He was mostly seen in full, large, helmless armor.
document_data.Relationships: His men wore full armor, like him, or green-and-silver. He served King [[Baerimgrim]], and fellow baron [[Feldrin]] was an ally.
document_data.History: In the moot called by King Baerimgrim in the {{yearlinkName|764}}, Baron Hothal made a bid to become king, supported by Feldrin, promising he could make peace with [[Laothkund]] by giving them the mines of [[iron]] and [[silver]] in the forest. Despite his backroom dealings being unappreciated by his fellow barons, there was serious consideration for his offer. However, Baron [[Tholone]]'s bid later counted more supporters than his own, making Feldrin desert him and try to make a deal with the others, that he'd support Tholone's too if Hothal was slain on the spot. However, as the King tried to crown Tholone, they were both slain by a spell from [[Nadrathen]]. In the ensuing chaos, Hothal made an attempt to slay Nadrathen, getting himself killed by crossbowmen which were almost certainly mind-controlled by the mage.
document_data.Reputation: He was said to only take off his armor in order to don bigger pieces of armor.
